job.title: People Data and Process Analyst - Excellence
job.description: People Data and Process Analyst - Excellence The People Data and Process Analyst - Excellence will collect, compile, and analyze HR data and metrics and apply this data to make recommendations for all HR data related activities. This role is responsible for regular data audits ensuring the integrity and accuracy of the data related to HR records, transactions, and processes. This role is also responsible for Tier 2 issue resolution for all global HR platforms. Cushman & Wakefield provides equal employment opportunity. Discrimination of any type will not be tolerated. Cushman & Wakefield is an Equal Opportunity / Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by state, federal, or local law.
